long_description: The Columbia Fast Trek(TM) hoodie will be this season's go-anywhere, do-anything piece for your outdoor enthusiast, Attached storm hood and thumbholes make the difference in style and comfort. 250g microfleece provides midweight warmth and fits easily under other layers without adding bulk. Full-length zipper and attached hood make this a great outer layer on dry, crisp winter days. Fast-Trek hoodie features thumbholes, ensuring zero gap between gloves and sleeves; outer layers go on easily without requiring irritating sleeve adjustments. 19 in. back length.
short_description: The Columbia Fast Trek(TM) hoodie will be this season's go-anywhere, do-anything piece for your outdoor enthusiast, Attached storm hood and thumbholes make the difference in style and comfort.
